```{r problem_1_data_import}
library(moderndive)
data("early_january_weather")
library(ggplot2)

temp_vs_time_plot <- ggplot(early_january_weather, aes(x = time_hour, y = temp, color = humid)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.7) +
  labs(
    title = "JFK Early January Weather",
    x = "Time (hour)",
    y = "Temperature (°F)",
    color = "Humidity"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

temp_vs_time_plot

```

```{r problem_2}
set.seed(2025)  # reproducible

# numeric sample (N(0,1))
num_sample <- rnorm(10)

# logical: is the numeric sample > 0?
is_positive <- num_sample > 0

# character: simple letters (or pick any 10 strings)
char_vec <- letters[1:10]

# factor: three ordered levels recycled to length 10
ord_factor <- factor(
  rep(c("low", "med", "high"), length.out = 10),
  levels = c("low", "med", "high"),
  ordered = TRUE
)

toy_df <- tibble::tibble(
  num_sample,
  is_positive,
  char_vec,
  ord_factor
)

toy_df

```
